page.title: 10PUBLIC HOUSES
page.content: I live in the Martlett which is one of two public houses in the area. Alcoholic and soft drinks are sold but alcoholic drinks are the most popular especially Exmoor ale. My parents sell meals as well which includes sandwiches of all kinds , snacks,steak and chicken in the basket and other hot dishes. Food is not served on Sundays. Six months ago a new skittle ally was built with a bar. This has made alot of extra work because the ally is open four nights a week. Private discos are run for weddings. Our busiest day is Saturday. The other pub at Holywell Lake also sells drinks and food which includes special meals for private parties . Skittles is a popular game so they also have a skittle ally.
